summary: A thriller involving an ongoing unsolved mystery in Alaska, where one town has seen an extraordinary number of unexplained disappearances during the past 40 years and there are accusations of a federal cover up.
cast: Milla Jovovich|Will Patton|Hakeem Kae-Kazim|Corey Johnson|Enzo Cilenti|Elias Koteas|Eric Loren|Mia McKenna-Bruce|Raphaël Coleman|Daphne Alexander|Alisha Seaton|Tyne Rafaeli|Paul Stefanov|Kiera McMaster|Sara Houghton|Julian Vergov|Ioan Karamfilov|Charlotte Milchard|Valentin Ganev|Vladimir Kolev|Jay Glenn Sunberg|Sylvia Lultchev|Olatunde Osunsanmi|Mike Straub|Andrew Whipp
keywords: alaska|found footage|year 2000|2000s|based on supposedly true story
title: La cuarta fase
